attributes.action: Expand this website to support votes AGAINST the petition as well as those in favour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The website is a really good idea, but it does not allow readers to vote against the proposal being viewed.  I'd like to see this feature added.

rejection.details:
This is covered in our FAQs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
